TopicTitle: Looking to filter out unbought parts in the editor

Articles.Content:
Okay, this is going to be a very specific question, and I reckon that I probably won't get a positive answer. But asking is free, so here goes

- I'm looking for a way to filter out parts I have researched but not yet bought from the lists in the editor scenes.

- Specifically, I want to filter parts out of the default view. In other words, without having to switch to advanced mode.

- I'd like to be able to toggle this filtering on and off at will while I'm in the editor.

Is there a mod which does this already?

If not, is there a mod that does something reasonably similar?
Maybe a good addition to Filter Extensions.
You mean, I should go make a feature request there?
Would be my first place to ask for something like this, yes.

Actually, it's already a feature. The only limitation is that you currently need to drop back to the space centre to toggle it. If you don't want any changes to the stock filters, you just delete the configs folder (which leaves you with options for: hide/show unpurchased, sort manufacturer tab by manufacturer / GameData folder, default to simple / advanced mode, and default selection for category/subcategory)

Edited November 11, 2015 by Crzyrndm

Well that's fantastic news, I think I'll live through having to exit the editor to toggle.

Gonna try it out this weekend when I have the time to set up a new modded save...
